body.name: SMUG Armless Office Chair Beige PU Leather Small Desk Chair Height Adjustable Stylish Vanity Chair with Wheels Computer Chair No Arms for Home or Office
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 19 hrs 26 mins
features: Armless Design: This armless desk chair features an armless design, providing a sleek and modern look to any workspace. Without arms, it allows for greater mobility and flexibility, ensuring maximum comfort during long hours of work

Enhanced Mobility: Equipped with wheels, the white armless office chairs with wheels is designed to effortlessly glide across various floor surfaces. The smooth movement allows you to easily maneuver around your desk or workspace, promoting efficient productivity

Compact and Space-saving: With its compact size, this desk chair no arms is perfect for offices or workspaces with limited space. The armless design allows it to be neatly tucked under your desk when not in use, maximizing the available space

Lumbar Support: Despite its smaller size, this office chair without arms does not compromise on comfort and support. Its PU leather upholstery provides a soft and comfortable seating experience, while the lumbar support design ensures proper posture and reduces the risk of back strain

Versatile Usage: Whether you are working from home, studying, or conducting meetings in a professional setting, this small office chair is suitable for various applications. Its stylish design and adjustable height make it a versatile choice for any workspace
Note: It is NOT WHITE, but rather a Beige color

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I am very pleased with this purchase, specifically the packaging of screws needed, and extra screws , all screws fit the way they are supposed to and finally , a tool, that is very usable to tighten screws that I will gladly use for other assembly, the chair study, good priced, and nice, like the rolling wheels

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Quality and Price
reviews.reviewText: The SMUG Armless Office Chair in Black was incredibly easy to set up, taking me only about 8 minutes. The process was straightforward, and the quality of the chair is excellent, especially considering the price. It fits perfectly in my apartment's built-in office space and functions flawlessly. I highly recommend it if you're seeking a combination of affordability and quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I got this for my younger sister for her new desk and she installed it herself so super easy to put together. The instructions had very specific directions that was super easy to follow. She put it together and she’s stoked!! She loves it! The color isn’t exactly white tho it’s more of a little off white which is still super cute!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This chair fits perfectly in my space, was very easy to put together and was even delivered a few days earlier than originally scheduled.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good chair, but a bit expensive
reviews.reviewText: From a quality standpoint this is a nice and comfortable chair but I have to say I had a hard time deciding if I should give it a 4 or 5-star review. So, let me go ahead and talk about my thoughts about it.- Packaging: all components were clearly marked and there was enough padding inside the box to protect everything. But, at the same time, the impression I got was that the box was previously opened and repackaged by someone as things were messy inside - even the tape closing the box was not placed in a professional way.- Assembling: it was easy enough to assemble. A tool is included and even extra screws are provided. The manual is also pretty clear, although I feel they could have done a better job in some drawings/diagrams. Still, I feel it should be easy enough for most people.- Quality: the chair looks pretty good, but I have mixed feelings about the hanger. The good news is that you can decide not to use it at all if you don't like it. It's a solid chair.- Comfort & Ergonomics: the chair is comfortable and it offers height and tilt control. Only the back is mesh - the seat is not. Oh, yes you can also adjust the headrest and armrest. I wish there was some lumbar support and better headrest options, but these would probably make it even more expensive. Also, the wheels are OK - but this is standard in most chairs. If you want something really good, you have to buy replacements.- Final Thoughts: it's a good chair and I didn't see any big issue here, but I would be expecting it to be better considering the $180 price tag.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect upgrade from old, broken "gaming" chair.
reviews.reviewText: Got this as an upgrade over my old, broken "gaming" chair. The kind that looks like a car bucket seat.While I loved that chair when I first got it, I quickly grew to not care for it too much.The seat was too hard, the back had no give, and the "Lumbar Pillow" kept moving all over the place.This new one is a lot like my old office chair from work that I could sit in for hours without a problem.It doesn't have a recline function for me to lay down at my desk, but i don't need that, and it rocks back plenty far, and I can lock that position in place and still feel more secure, and more stable that my old chair.The arm rests move up and down, and aren't terribly uncomfortable, but could use with some padding (cheap 3D party accessory that can easily be found on Amazon) but all in all are niceThe head rest takes some getting used to, but at least adjusts to height and angle, so you can find a position that suits you.The wheels are a bit larger than other desk chairs I've used, which lets them roll nice and smooth.The coat hook on the back is a nice addition, though I got it caught in a couple things, so I just took it off. Maybe when I have a bit more space in the office :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty Easy to Assemble, Comfy and Has Good Features
reviews.reviewText: My husband works at home and spends 10 hours a day in his office on the phone, in front of a computer. A comfortable chair while working is a definite must for him. So far, this fits the bill.Assembly was pretty easy. All of the hardware is included with the chair as well as instructions that were 'OK, but could have been better' (according to my husband).Overall, the chair is comfortable and the ergonomic design plays a big part in that. The mesh backrest provides ample support, the as does the seat cushion which is softer than it appears. Its easy to adjust the chair's height and angles. (There is even a tilt function -had to laugh at the description above because it points out the tilt function allows you to take a nap in your chair during the work day. lol) Holds up to 250lbs.The chair is on wheels and can be rolled around easily. (Ours is on plastic to protect the carpet...rolls without issue)No price is showing on the listing so I cannot comment as to whether the price is reasonable. But I can tell you this is a comfy chair that is very sturdy, easy to adjust and pretty easy to assemble.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfy chair for a big guy!
reviews.reviewText: This chair was surprisingly easy to assemble, only taking about 15 minutes. I am a big guy, so finding good office chairs can be hit or miss. This is definitely a hit. It rolls very smooth and the adjustments work without any issues. The lower back support is important for me and this chair nailed it! The seat itself is comfortable enough for hours of computer work. I'm very pleased with this product!!
